roleset.name: having consequences

example.name: args0, 1
example.text: The Son's angry, sarcastic questions demand that Adam consider the enormity of disobedience in all its repercussions of loss, shame, misery, and betrayal.
example.arg: of loss, shame, misery, and betrayal.

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Mapping vulnerability to climate change and its repercussions on human health in Pakistan.

example.name: Light Verb
example.text: President Barack Obama's reelection will have repercussions on the commercial real estate market for years to come.
example.arg: on the commercial real estate market

roleset.note: REPERCUSSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, percussion.01. No VNcls. (from repercussion.01-n)
